Module contents

Submodule implementing method to centralize gradient over zero mean.

This operation is described in the following paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2004.01461.pdf

The code is based on implementations provided by: - https://ai.plainenglish.io/gradient-centralization-in-keras-9e4e34a8b895 - https://keras.io/examples/vision/gradient_centralization/ - https://github.com/Rishit-dagli/Gradient-Centralization-TensorFlow
